Package it.polimi.ingsw.GUI

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionsHandler
    Class used to handle actions triggered by user-input in the playing stage.
    AllCardsMenuController
    Controller class for the AllCards stage that will be diplayed when the challenger has to choose the available cards for each players.
    AppMain  
    Building
    Class used to represent buildings in the PlayingStageController
    CreateMenuController
    Controller for the create match menu.
    EndController
    Class which represent the end match dialog.
    GodObject
    Class used to encapsulate images and label for the god choosen that will be displayed in the playing stage on the left-bottom corner.
    JoinMenuController
    Controller for the JoinMenu.fxml stage.
    MainController
    Class used to handle each stage based on the Message received by the Client.
    Pawn
    Class that inherits the proprieties from ImageView.
    PlayingStageController
    Controller for the PlayingStage.fxml stage.
    SelectCardMenuController
    Controller for the SelectCard.fxml stage.
    SessionObject
    A SessionObject is used in the JoinMenuController to represent each Session in the session's TableView.
    StartMenuController
    Controller for the StartMenu.fxml stage that is the first stage loaded.
    UsernameDialog
    Dialog used to insert the player's username.
    WaitController
    When a player is waiting for other players to join the session it will be placed in a waiting stage until the Game starts.
